# From nos-scraper project (local folder)

import requests
import bs4
import random
import datetime

ignore = ["dood", "doden", "moord", "martel"]

WIND_DIRECTION = {
    'N': 'noorden',
    'NNO': 'noordnoordoosten',
    'NO': 'noordoosten',
    'ONO': 'oostnoordoosten',
    'O': 'oosten',
    'OZO': 'oostzuidoosten',
    'ZO': 'zuidoosten',
    'ZZO': 'zuidzuidoosten',
    'Z': 'zuiden',
    'ZZW': 'zuidzuidwesten',
    'ZW': 'zuidwesten',
    'WZW': 'westzuidwesten',
    'W': 'westen',
    'WNW': 'westnoordwesten',
    'NW': 'noordwesten',
    'NNW': 'noordnoordwesten',
    'Zuid': 'zuiden',
    'West': 'westen',
    'Noord': 'noorden',
    'Oost': 'oosten',
 }

def get_headlines(date):
    base_url = "https://nos.nl/nieuws/archief/"
    url = base_url + date
    response = requests.get(url)
    soup = bs4.BeautifulSoup(response.text, "html.parser")
    headlines_html = soup.find_all("div", {"class": "list-time__title link-hover"})
    headlines = [headline.text for headline in headlines_html]
    return headlines

def filter_headlines(headlines, ignore):
    filtered = []
    for headline in headlines:
        if not any(word in headline.lower() for word in ignore):
            filtered.append(headline)
    return filtered

def get_sample(headlines, N):
    N = min(N, len(headlines)) 
    return random.sample(headlines, N)

def news_headlines(date, N):
    headlines = get_headlines(date)
    headlines = filter_headlines(headlines, ignore)
    sample = get_sample(headlines, N)
    for headline in sample:
        print("\nâ€¢", headline)
    print()

def get_historic_weather_report(date):
    base_url = "https://weerverleden.nl/"
    url = base_url + date.replace("-", "")
    response = requests.get(url)
    soup = bs4.BeautifulSoup(response.text, "html.parser")
    weather_html = soup.find_all("p", {"class": ["wind", "temperature", "sun", "shower", "clouds"]})
    weather = [item.text for item in weather_html]
    weather_report = "\n" + " ".join(weather) + "\n"
    return weather_report


def get_live_weather_report(location="Amsterdam"):
    base_url = "https://weerlive.nl/api/json-data-10min.php?key=2e37799383&locatie="
    url = base_url + location
    response = requests.get(url)
    data = response.json()["liveweer"][0]
    verw = data["verw"].split(".")
    verw[0] = verw[0].replace(verw[0][0], verw[0][0].lower())
    weather_report = (
        f"\nHet is {data['samenv'].lower()}, met een gemiddelde temperatuur van {data['gtemp']} graden. "
        + f"De wind komt uit het {WIND_DIRECTION[data['windr']]}. "
        + f"De zon komt op om {data['sup']} en gaat onder om {data['sunder']}. "
        + f"De verwachting is {'.'.join(verw)}.\n"
    )
    return weather_report


def weather_report(date):
    if date == datetime.date.today().strftime("%Y-%m-%d"):
        weather_report = get_live_weather_report()
    else:
        weather_report = get_historic_weather_report(date)
    print(weather_report)
